about_the_game:
The Farmer's Diary is your journey to restore an old and neglected farm to its glorious days. With your limited budget, you progress through the game with the goal of reaching an advanced farm using your farming skills.

Upgrade System
You will upgrade your farm and make it more developed and beautiful by upgrading each building separately.

Farming
Your crop field is your greatest treasure. Plant the seed and give them water until harvest time and collect and sell your grown products.

Husbandry
These beautiful animals are your friends. Don't forget to look after them and feed them. also you can sell the products you get from them.

Orcharding
Do you want to grow fruit trees? then buy some saplings! The seedlings will take some time to grow, but if you be patience they will eventually give you big returns.

Production (Available With First Update)
You can purchase various production machines for your workshop, where you can produce many new products using the raw materials you gather by farming.

These beautiful animals are your friends. Don't forget to look after them and feed them. also you can sell the products you get from them.

Do you want to grow fruit trees? then buy some saplings! The seedlings will take some time to grow, but if you be patience they will eventually give you big returns.

name: Farmer's Diary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: There is a lot of work to be done on this farm, a long-term adventure awaits you where you can take farming, orcharding and animal husbandry to the next level with your friends.
